tab1.title: Instructions
tab1.useInstructions: You need to have a UVO (Kia) or Bluelink (Hyundai) account with PIN for your car(s). Add your car as a device in Homey, and fill in the username, password and PIN.
tab1.warningInstructions: USE THIS APP AT OWN RISK! In the app settings you can change the update interval. The default is 1 minute, but only when the engine is on. After switching on the engine it can take up to 5 minutes before the app starts updating the car status. You can set forced updates, that will also work when the engine is off. WARNING: forced updates will drain your 12V battery.
tab1.registerInstructions: This app is Work In Progress. At this stage only Kia cars in EU work. Hyundai and other regions will be added later.
